actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Mineral Leasing Act of 1920 as amended by the Trans-Alaska Pipeline Authorization Act to insure domestic distribution of Alaskan crude oil through clarification of the 1973 Trans-Alaska Pipeline Authorization Act.
short_title: Alaskan Oil Distribution and Export Plan

summary.text: Alaskan Oil Distribution and Export Plan - Amends the Mineral Leasing Act of 1920 to prohibit exports of domestically produced crude oil transported by pipeline over rights-of-way granted pursuant to such Act. Authorizes exemptions from such prohibition where required for convenience or increased efficiency of transportation.

titles.title: Alaskan Oil Distribution and Export Plan

A bill to amend the Mineral Leasing Act of 1920 as amended by the Trans-Alaska Pipeline Authorization Act to insure domestic distribution of Alaskan crude oil through clarification of the 1973 Trans-Alaska Pipeline Authorization Act.
